original_text: Then ye shall appoint you cities to be cities of refuge for you; that the slayer may flee thither, which killeth any person at unawares.
korean_text: 너희를 위하여 성읍을 도피성으로 정하여 부지중에 살인한 자가 그리로 피하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Then ye shall appoint you cities
to be cities of refuge for you
that the slayer may flee thither
which killeth any person at unawares
